name: 8 Ball Strike: Win Real Cash
description:
Calling all pool sharks! Test your skills with 8 Ball Strike : win real cash, an exciting billiards game and you can play to win real cash along with other prizes! Enjoy smooth controls and a high-quality interactive experience with unique features that will have you at the edge of your seat with each shot!

Download for free to compete in multiplayer tournaments and win REAL CASH and prizes! We're committed to providing a fair and secure social competition gaming platform for our players.

How to play:
1. All players will start each game the same way to ensure fairness
2. The game follows skill-based rules and has an accurate seed system to ensure fairness and consistency among all players' break-shot status and scoring;
3. Base points = ball number x pocket multiplier. The pocket multiplier will shift clockwise after each ball is pocketed. Get extra points with trick shots, table cleared, unused cue balls, and time remaining.
4. When the game ends, all players will be ranked based on the score. The player with the highest score wins the game and wins cash prizes.
5. Featuring an innovative triple-shot mode, rewards are enhanced for every 3 consecutive balls pocketed (i.e. increased pocket multipliers, triple-shot bonus, table cleared bonus, extra cue balls, etc.), boosting the excitement and strategic aspect of the game.

EXPLORE FUN FEATURES

Play Free Games, Win Real Cash!
-Use Diamonds to play free matches or participate in cash games to win real money. Earn free gifts every day by logging in and participating in various in-game events!

Multiplayer Tournaments with Exciting Match Modes
-Play in 5–10 player tournaments of different match modes where the top 3 players win. The higher you rank, the bigger the prize! Practice for free before playing cash games, then choose from a variety of prize pools to win REAL CASH and prizes!

Play Against Real Players of Similar Skill Level
-Match with real players of your skill level to play a classic, fun, and fair 8-ball pool game!

Safe and Secure Withdrawals
-It's safe and easy to withdraw your winnings with PayPal. We also work with other trusted partners including Apple Pay, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Venmo to make the deposit and withdrawal process secure, smooth, and worry-free.

Win Extra Cash with Minigames
-Win extra rewards and real money with our classic minigames like Lucky Box, daily login and other fun features!

Ad-Free
-A truly immersive gaming experience with no ads to interrupt your gameplay!

* Cash games are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD, TN, and VT. However, players in these states can still enjoy the fun with free games!
* Players must be at least 18 years of age. In some jurisdictions where Cash games are not available, players can compete in our free games. See our Terms of Service for more information.
